name: Do the Business
description:
Requires 4 controllers and players!

Here at the Company, we believe that all of our employees have equal standing. But those who exercise core competency, business acumen, and just the right amount of social elevation have the power to make it far. Strap into the business adventure that is your everyday life! 

Don't miss out on that Christmas bonus, and get your quarterly reports in on time! It's time to make business do the business.

And remember, it's not a contest! 

Created by Team Disaster

  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Benjamin d'Abadie
  • Peter Francis
  • Heather (Snorkelhead) Cleveland
